entries.title: Judge Releases Decision Approving Meta's Virtual-Reality Deal
entries.description: The unsealed ruling lays out the FTC’s loss of its bid to block the Facebook parent company’s acquisition.

entries.title: How to Reduce Your Email Mess and Stress
entries.description: Heed these productivity-boosting tech tips for Gmail and Outlook users.

entries.title: Sam Bankman-Fried's Psychiatrist Became Key Player at FTX
entries.description: Hired as a coach at the crypto exchange, George Lerner was there for its dramatic downfall.

entries.title: When Does Elon Musk Sleep? Billionaire Speaks of Limits to Fixing Twitter and His Back Pain
entries.description: At Tesla trial and in tweets, the executive gives a glimpse into his personal challenges.
